title.native: 『ホロライブ・オルタナティブ』 ティザーPVs

description:
Welcome to an alternative world.
Another possibility for hololive: hololive △lternative

(Source: YouTube description)

Includes:
Note: A 30-second sneak peek of the first PV was previously released on February 17, 2021.
1) 『ホロライブ・オルタナティブ』 ティザーPV（Fullver）/ [hololive Alternative] Teaser PV (full ver.), released May 21 2021.
2) 『ホロライブ・オルタナティブ』 2ndティザーPV / [hololive Alternative] 2nd Teaser, released June 11, 2022.

tags.name: Advertisement
tags.description: Produced in order to promote the products of a certain company.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Pirates
tags.description: Prominently features sea-faring adventurers branded as criminals by the law.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Shrine Maiden
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a shrine maiden.

tags.name: Succubus
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a succubus, a creature in medieval folklore that typically uses their sexual prowess to trap and seduce people to feed off them.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamada_uk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/22HS_drill/) Originating from [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/). Works outside anime: - Melty Blood: Type Lumina (Video Game, 2021) (Cut-in Animation Character Design, Animation Director, Key Animation)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mayuge1017)

A Tokyo Zoukei University graduate, he's one of the leading digital animators in the industry, with good character animation and catchy effects.

He is a "follower" of [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/). In his university days, he was in the same circle as [Ryuu Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/133512/). They still have a good relationship and work with each other a lot. 

He is also a good friend of [Takahito Sakazume](https://anilist.co/staff/131945/), the two working often as a "two man production team."

Enokido is mainly known for his work on the Fate franchise, being both the action director for [Fate/Apocrypha](https://anilist.co/anime/98035/) and having directed the majority of the [Fate/Grand Order Commercials](https://anilist.co/anime/101184/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/573594263)

Originating from [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/), where he worked for the first four years of his career.

He gained a lot of attention for the "Chika Dance" ending animation on [Kaguya-sama](https://anilist.co/anime/101921/)'s third episode, which he storyboarded, directed and key animated by himself. Since then he has kept making waves with his work on EDs, such as the ones for [Koisuru Asteroid](https://anilist.co/anime/108092/) and [Assault Lily: Bouquet](https://anilist.co/anime/112479/), as well as PVs, and other short-length work.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tnkzm_tk)

Formerly affiliated with [White Fox](https://anilist.co/studio/314/White-Fox). Currently affiliated with [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/A1-Pictures).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/94072097)

Close friends with [Kai Shibata](https://anilist.co/staff/132094/).

Married to fellow Animator [Reiko Nagasawa](https://anilist.co/staff/140343).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamada_uk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/22HS_drill/) Originating from [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/). Works outside anime: - Melty Blood: Type Lumina (Video Game, 2021) (Cut-in Animation Character Design, Animation Director, Key Animation)

**Height:** 167 cm
**Fanbase name:** Dead Beats
**Illustrator:** [Yukisame](https://anilist.co/staff/258988/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/mori-calliope/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL_qhgtOy0dy1Agp8vkySQg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/moricalliope) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/user-694398002) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@moricalliope_hololiveen)

Mori Calliope is a female English Virtual YouTuber endorsed by hololive.

The Grim Reaper's first apprentice. Because the world's medical system advanced so dramatically, Calliope became a VTuber to collect souls. It seems that the lost souls vaporized by the wholesome relationships of VTubers flow through her as well. In the end, she's a gentle-hearted girl whose sweet voice contradicts the morbid things she tends to say, as well as her hardcore vocals.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mayuge1017)

A Tokyo Zoukei University graduate, he's one of the leading digital animators in the industry, with good character animation and catchy effects.

He is a "follower" of [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/). In his university days, he was in the same circle as [Ryuu Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/133512/). They still have a good relationship and work with each other a lot. 

He is also a good friend of [Takahito Sakazume](https://anilist.co/staff/131945/), the two working often as a "two man production team."

Enokido is mainly known for his work on the Fate franchise, being both the action director for [Fate/Apocrypha](https://anilist.co/anime/98035/) and having directed the majority of the [Fate/Grand Order Commercials](https://anilist.co/anime/101184/).

**Height:** 167 cm
**Fanbase name:** Dead Beats
**Illustrator:** [Yukisame](https://anilist.co/staff/258988/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/mori-calliope/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL_qhgtOy0dy1Agp8vkySQg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/moricalliope) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/user-694398002) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@moricalliope_hololiveen)

Mori Calliope is a female English Virtual YouTuber endorsed by hololive.

The Grim Reaper's first apprentice. Because the world's medical system advanced so dramatically, Calliope became a VTuber to collect souls. It seems that the lost souls vaporized by the wholesome relationships of VTubers flow through her as well. In the end, she's a gentle-hearted girl whose sweet voice contradicts the morbid things she tends to say, as well as her hardcore vocals.

[Website](https://www.bonjoursuzuki.com/)

__Bonjour Suzuki__ is a Japanese singer-songwriter. Before making her major debut with Media Factory, she was an indie musician known on various media sites such as Youtube, Nico Nico Douga, and SoundCloud.

An arranger and composer. He plays the guitar, keyboard and bass.

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/hideyuki.Daichi.Suzuki) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/daichi307) | [Website](http://dai-chi.sakura.ne.jp/index.html)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mayuge1017)

A Tokyo Zoukei University graduate, he's one of the leading digital animators in the industry, with good character animation and catchy effects.

He is a "follower" of [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/). In his university days, he was in the same circle as [Ryuu Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/133512/). They still have a good relationship and work with each other a lot. 

He is also a good friend of [Takahito Sakazume](https://anilist.co/staff/131945/), the two working often as a "two man production team."

Enokido is mainly known for his work on the Fate franchise, being both the action director for [Fate/Apocrypha](https://anilist.co/anime/98035/) and having directed the majority of the [Fate/Grand Order Commercials](https://anilist.co/anime/101184/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroekeisuke)

Currently freelance. Worked for [Bones](https://anilist.co/studio/4/) from 2011 to 2017.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamada_uk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/22HS_drill/) Originating from [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/). Works outside anime: - Melty Blood: Type Lumina (Video Game, 2021) (Cut-in Animation Character Design, Animation Director, Key Animation)
